Case# NSDrawer.State.openingState

macOS 10.0–10.13Deprecated

```
case openingState
```

Deprecated

Drawers are deprecated; consider using NSSplitViewController

## [Discussion](/documentation/appkit/nsdrawer/state-swift.enum/openingstate#Discussion)

The drawer is in the process of opening.
